UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: D- and N-Methyl Amino Acids for Modulating the Therapeutic Properties of Antimicrobial Peptides and Lipopeptides
Literature.Author: Humpola MV, Spinelli R, Erben M, Perdomo V

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>400 µM,Human erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=1.4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=0.7µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1.4µM),Staphylococcus aureus BSF FBCB1313(MIC=5.6µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=5.6µM),Candida albicans PEEC 2(MIC=44.9µM),Candida tropicalis DBFIQ 3(MIC=89.7µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=399.90±28.96µM)
